Entries.default: "SHOP IMP. GREETINGS." This imp mutters something dark and hateful under its breath. It regards you with narrow, wandering eyes and flared nostrils.
"Show me what you have for sale."
"Why are you so hostile?"
"Farewell."
"IS NOT HOSTILE. IS JUST IMP." He bares his teeth and hisses to emphasize the point.
"EH. BUY SOMETHING." He makes a rude gesture toward the shop's wares.

"HEY! WHAT YOU DOING IN FASSINA'S ROOM? NO CUSTOMERS ALLOWED." 

In a showing of courtesy as practiced as it is grudging, the imp gestures for you to leave by the way you came.
"Are you trying to order me around, imp?"
"Sorry, I'll leave."

"EH! NO HURT. NOT LIKE I MAKE THE RULES AROUND HERE ANYWAY..." 

The imp backs away slowly, shielding itself with its bared claws.
"I'm a special customer."

"EH? SPECIAL? FINE. STUPID FASSINA NEVER TELLS ME ANYTHING..." 

The imp flutters away, mumbling dejected curses.
"I'm looking for Ifren."
"DEAD THIEF? CHECK BOX. HE STILL RATTLING AROUND IN THERE." The imp chuckles at this - a wet, unpleasant sound.
"I need to speak with Fassina."
"AND EXPECT ME TO KNOW WHERE SHE'S AT, EH? EH?" The imp prods you once, twice, his wings flaring open with irritation and aggression.
"Well, what are YOU doing here? Pervert."

"I... YOU DON'T GET TO DEFLECT BLAME! I FOUND YOU, NOT OTHER WAY AROUND." 

The imp regards you with an imperious sneer.

"THAT'S RIGHT, YOU GO."

The imp studies you with deep loathing as you leave.
"What was that?"
"Farewell."
"LAZYBONES IS PROBABLY AT THE LUMINOUS BATHHOUSE. TAKING BATH. KNOW WHEN LAST TIME I TOOK BATH? NEITHER DO I." The imp stares at the exit with envy and longing.
"IS IMP, AND... IS SAD." His expression falls. New sags, wrinkles, and edges grow definition.
"FASSINA SPENDS TOO MUCH TIME AWAY FROM SHOP, LEAVING ME TO FEND FOR SELF. IS BAD ENOUGH MASTER WON'T LET ME LEAVE STUPID SHOP."
"Why do you think Fassina spends so much time away?"
"So you're not angry at all, are you?"
"Back to my other questions."
"EH. SHE HATES HER WORK, HATES ARKEMYR, HATES ME. REASON ENOUGH." He counts on each finger, then balls his claw into a fist.
"GO ON. I NO CARE." He gestures for you to hurry.
"IMPS COMPLICATED. KITH THINK WE HAVE TWO BIG EMOTIONS - ANGRY AND HAPPY." He smacks his lips and stumbles on the longer, more nuanced words.
"FASSINA MUCH NICER LATELY. SAID HELLO BEFORE SHE KICKED ME. PROGRESS, EH?" Shop Imp gestures toward the wares in an encouraging manner.
"FASSINA KICKED ME IN THE HEAD. NO PROVOCATION. WHAT YOU WANT?" Shop Imp flutters at a slant.
He aims a fearful glance toward Fassina and lowers his voice.
"FASSINA ... DEAD? UH." The imp turns to the left and right in an uncertain manner.
"MAYBE I GET ORDERS TO KILL YOU LATER. NEED SOMETHING IN MEANTIME?"
"BECAUSE FASSINA WAS FRIEND. NOW FASSINA DEAD. HAPPY? I'M NOT!" He spits a black glob of phlegm at your feet.
"Show me what you have for sale."
"HEH. NOPE. FASSINA'S ORDERS." The imp shrugs and picks his nose.

"BUT KITH CAN'T SMELL IMP SPRAY. JOVIAL SPRAY, MELANCHOLY SPRAY, CREATIVE SPRAY - IMPS SPRAY ALL OVER EVERYTHING." To accentuate the point, a little puff of foul-smelling effluvia wafts out of an orifice that was not evident a second ago.
